original_text: His brothers said to him, “Are you indeed to reign over us? Or are you indeed to rule over us?” So they hated him even more for his dreams and for his words.
korean_text: 그의 형들이 그에게 이르되 네가 참으로 우리의 왕이 되겠느냐 참으로 우리를 다스리게 되겠느냐 하고 그의 꿈과 그의 말로 말미암아 그를 더욱 미워하더니

sentences.original_text: Are you indeed to reign over us?
Or are you indeed to rule over us?
sentences.korean_translation: 아니면 네가 정말 우리를 통치하려 하느냐?

sentences.original_text: So they hated him even more
